messages.subject: I'll share our moment too ;)
messages.msgSnippet: Chloe (5) and I just got done playing Doctor...usually she is the doctor. Today I got the job. She had ailments that I *fixed* and then it just turned into a
messages.messageBody:
Chloe (5) and I just got done playing Doctor...usually she is the
doctor. Today I got the job. She had ailments that I *fixed* and
then it just turned into a really relaxing and quiet massage for
her. Then we sat on the couch together and ate while looking up at
all her balloons (left over from her birthday). It was peaceful and
nice, neither of us said much. Then she just asked me to turn on
Seasame street for her. She watched her favorite parts and is now
back in the office quietly spinning on the chair. We were suppose to
take this field trip down to Sea World today with our homeschooling
group, but Raiden (15mos) got sick last night and is not up to par
so we missed the field trip. I'm so glad. I love days like this. She
just asked me to go play Monopoly, I hope Raiden will continue to
sleep, I love to spend time with her like this :)

Ticia
